ing: 4 pounds skinless, boneless chicken thighs, cut into 1-inch pieces
2 pounds red potatoes, cut in 1-inch pieces
1 pound beef stew meat, cut into bite-size pieces (optional)
1 (16 ounce) package frozen whole kernel corn
1 (15 ounce) can cut green beans, drained
1 0.42 oz packet concentrated vegetable base (such as SwansonÂ® Vegetable Flavor BoostÂ®)
des: "This is a booyah recipe that is adapted from originally a 50 gallon recipe cooked in large 55 gallon cast-iron kettles with a wood fire, most often at church picnics in northeastern Wisconsin."
ins:
Mix chicken, potatoes, beef, corn, carrots, green beans, chicken broth, beef broth, diced tomatoes, onion, celery, bell pepper, cabbage, salt, basil, oregano, celery salt, black pepper, and vegetable base in a slow cooker.
Cook on Low for 6 hours.
